description.en: 100% Upgrade Rate up to +7. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.ar: 100% Upgrade Rate up to +7. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.br: 100% Taxa de Fortalecimento até +7. Para usar, coloque o pergaminho na caixa apropriada no Menu de Fortalecimento antes de começar a fortalecer. O pergaminho é consumido no processo.
description.cns: 100%精炼成功率至+7。若要使用，请在尝试精炼之前，在精炼菜单的相应框中放置卷轴。卷轴在此次过程中被消耗掉。
description.fi: 100% Upgrade Rate up to +7. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.fil: 100% Upgrade Rate up to +7. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.fr: Parchemin garantissant la réussite de l'enchantement des armes et armures à 100% (efficace jusqu'à un enchantement +7, mais chaque parchemin n'est actif que pour une seule tentative d'enchantement. Attention, ne fonctionne pas pour les élémentarisations.).
description.id: Tingkat Peningkatan 100% hingga +7. Untuk menggunakan, tempatkan gulir di kotak yang sesuai pada Menu Upgrade sebelum mencoba upgrade. Gulungan dikonsumsi dalam proses.
description.it: 100% Upgrade Rate up to +7. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.jp: 精錬が100％成功する。精錬値+7まで使用できます。精錬メニューの適切な位置へセットし、使用します。（通称: Scroll of SFusion High）
description.nl: 100% Upgrade Rate up to +7. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.pl: 100% Upgrade Rate up to +7. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.ru: 100% вероятность успеха при усилении предмета вплоть до +7. Для однократного применения.
description.sp: Tasa de Mejora del 100% hasta +7. Para usarlo, coloca el pergamino en la casilla correspondiente del Menú de Mejora antes de intentar la mejora. El pergamino se consume en el proceso.
description.sw: 100% Upgrade Rate up to +7. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.th: 100% อัตราการอัปเกรดสูงถึง +7 ในการใช้งาน ให้วางคัมภีร์ไปที่กล่องที่เหมาะสมบนเมนูอัพเกรดก่อนที่จะพยายามอัพเกรด
description.tw: 裝備精鍊成功率 100%，此道具只可使用到 +7 (道具使用之後消失)
description.vi: Tỷ lệ nâng cấp 100% lên đến +7. Để sử dụng, hãy đặt cuộn vào ô thích hợp trên Menu Nâng cấp trước khi thử nâng cấp. Cuộn giấy được sử dụng trong quá trình này.
